name: PertentuX
description:
Beat this First Person Memory Challenge!

Your inside printer's toner and you are in charge of bringing ink to the injectors.

A cube full of ink it will appear at the centre of the chip. Pick it up and match the Ink's colour with the Injector's colour. It's there nine injectors inside the chips and they will show up with random colours.  

You have twenty seconds to check the injector's colours before the game begin. After twenty seconds, you'll have ninety seconds to match all nine injectors with their respective ink colours.

Be careful with Walls!! They might harm you... or help you... who knows?

-- Colours --

Black

Blue

Cyan

Green

Grey

Magenta

Red

White

Yellow

-- PC Controls -- 

Move with the arrow keys or ASDW

Look around with Mouse

Use 'E' to Pick Up the Ink

Use 'Space' to change the Ink's colour

Use 'Q' to invoke a new Ink cube (You need to have Ink with you)

Use 'Space' to match the Ink with the Injector (You need to have the Ink with you)
